Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and they will bat first.
Kulasekara to Finch, 1 run gets good inward movement straightaway, from outside off and he tucks it to the on side
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run keeps it outside the off stump and he moves across and defends
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run squared him up a bit as he tried to work that through the on side, hits his pads and lobs away
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run moves right across his stumps and defends solidly this time
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run lands it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run outside edge and it drops short of slip! He pokes at one that moves away
Malinga to Finch, no run lands it outside the off stump and he safely shoulders arms, warm up delivery
Malinga to Finch, 1 run Finch opens the face and steers him just wide of point
Malinga to Hughes, no run gets his rhythm here with an inswinger that lands on middle and leg and he works it straight to mid-on
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run direct hit but Finch is home! Tucks it down to square leg and Jeevan Mendis does well to underarm the throw to the stumps on the dive, no need to go to the third umpire
Malinga to Finch, no run moves away from the right-hander and he leaves it alone
Malinga to Finch, no run stays on the back foot and defends solidly
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run drifts towards the body and he shuffles and clips it to the on side
Kulasekara to Finch, no run that natural inswinger, he stays back and works it to the on side
Kulasekara to Finch, 1 run they're hitting the stumps this morning, but not quick enough, this was good running, turned it to mid-on and the other Mendis - Ajantha - hits the bowler's stumps
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run slants it across the left-hander and he knocks it wide of point
Kulasekara to Finch, no run nips this one back in anfd Finch gets his pad across and leaves it alone
Malinga to Hughes, no run drifts towards the pads and Hughes tucks it to the on side
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs that's a friendly full toss and he just punches it away softly past cover, the yorker didn't quite come off
Malinga to Hughes, 1 wide slides this one wide down the leg side, fails to control the movement
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs that's too straight on the pads and he shuffles and clips it with the movement wide of midwicket
Malinga to Hughes, no run much shorter in length and he stays right back at the crease and defends
Malinga to Hughes, no run stays beside the line and he taps it to the off side
Malinga to Hughes, no run stays right behind the line and he defends this one
Kulasekara to Finch, no run on a good length outside off and he comes forward and defends
Kulasekara to Finch, no run fullish outside off and he comes forward and defends
Kulasekara to Finch, no run just short of a length outside off and he defends to the off side
Kulasekara to Finch, no run just shortens his length and he pushes it back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Finch, 2 runs
Kulasekara to Finch, no run
Malinga to Hughes, no run bowls it straight and he stays back and defends back to the bowler
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run comes beside the line and he steers it to the off side
Malinga to Finch, 1 run outside edge, squared him up a bit and he edges that past the slips and down to third man
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs fires that full and wide outside off, he bends down and crashes that past backward point
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run another square drive but it's in the air and he spoons this over backward point, third man was square
Malinga to Finch, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he shuffles and tucks it off the pads
Kulasekara to Finch, 3 runs shimmies down the track and checks his drive, punches it wide of cover and they take three
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run gets across his stumps and pushes it to the off side
Kulasekara to Hughes, 2 runs excellent running by Hughes, steers it wide of point and Malinga fumbles at third man, Hughes sets off for the second quickly
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run full outside off and moving away and he leaves it alone
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run full and moves away and he pushes forward and defends
Kulasekara to Hughes, FOUR runs full in length outside off and he comes forward and he pushes it wide of mid-off and cover, well timed
Angelo Mathews to Finch, no run fullish in length outside off and he leaves it alone
Angelo Mathews to Finch, no run
Angelo Mathews to Finch, 1 run lands it outside off and he opens the face and steers it to third man
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run good length outside off and he comes across and chops it to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Finch, 3 runs drifts on the pads and he gets across and clips it over midwicket, didn't time it as well as he would have liked
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
Kulasekara to Finch, 1 run good length drifting in on middle and leg and he punches it down the ground to mid-on
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run angles across him and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
Kulasekara to Finch, no run attempted yorker and he comes across and drills it back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Finch, no run stays behind the line and tucks it to the on side
Kulasekara to Finch, 1 run comes back in and he clips it with the movement down to midwicket
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run good length on the off stump and steers it towards point
Angelo Mathews to Finch, 1 run works it away off the body down to square leg
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run Hughes goes for a mighty heave and he misses it completely, outside off and it didn't bounce as much
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs that was a cleverly played, he saw there was no slip and deliberately steered that past the keeper, nice late cut
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs shot! Too wide outside off and he stays at the crease, stretches out and cuts that hard past backward point, does the bat twirl on the follow through
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run good length outside off and he defends to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run full on the stumps and he clips it down to square leg
Mendis to Hughes, no run tossed up and he stays back and defends
Mendis to Hughes, no run flatter delivery and he opens the face and steers it to point
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run skids through and he tucks it behind square
Mendis to Finch, no run

Mendis to Finch, OUT outside edge! Mendis strikes in his first over of his one-day comeback, it was bowled off the back of the hand, Finch was prodding forward, bounced a bit more and took the edge, no doubts about that
Mendis to Khawaja, no run tossed up outside off and he comes forward and shoulders arms
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips it to fine leg, finds the gap there
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run stays back and he punches it towards mid-on
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run fullish on the pads and he works it down to square leg
Angelo Mathews to Khawaja, no run full outside off and he gets forward and defends
Angelo Mathews to Khawaja, no run good length on the off stump and he pushes it to point
Angelo Mathews to Khawaja, no run fullish on the pads and he works it away towards mid-on
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run flatter delivery and he works it to midwicket
Mendis to Khawaja, 1 wide that was too wide of the leg stump and he leaves it alone
Mendis to Khawaja, 1 run tossed up and he comes forward and works it to the on side
Mendis to Hughes, no run full on the off stump and he pushes it to mid-on
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run flatter one and he works it towards mid-on
Mendis to Khawaja, no run fullish and flatter and he pushes it to the bowler
Mendis to Khawaja, no run full outside off and he drives and nearly edges it
Dilshan to Hughes, no run tossed up outside off and he comes forward and he comes forward and defends
Dilshan to Hughes, no run slower delivery and he comes forward and defends
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run tossed up and he clips this one to long-on
Dilshan to Khawaja, no run tossed up and he defends this to the on side
Dilshan to Khawaja, 1 run tossed up and he clips it to the on side
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run
Mendis to Hughes, 2 runs fuller on the pads and he clips it to the on side for a couple
Mendis to Hughes, no run tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
Mendis to Hughes, no run quicker delivery and he stays back and defends
Mendis to Hughes, no run quicker delivery and he works it to the on side
Mendis to Hughes, 1 wide fires that down the leg side and he doesn't offer a shot
Mendis to Hughes, no run flatter delivery and he leaves it alone
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run gets forward and he pushes it to mid-on
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run stays back at the crease and he pushes it to long-off
Dilshan to Khawaja, 1 run stays beside the line and cuts him to point
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run tossed up outside off he pushes it to cover

Dilshan to Khawaja, OUT Appeal fora run out and Khawaja is in trouble! And he's gone! Schoolboy error by Khawaja, credit to Jeevan Mendis for this one, Khawaja worked it towards short midwicket and set off, he turned back and had to dive
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run tossed up and drilled down the ground to long-on
Dilshan to Hughes, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Mendis to Bailey, no run comes well forward and defends
Mendis to Bailey, no run comes forward to defend and the ball clips the pads and rolls away, missing leg
Mendis to Bailey, FOUR runs drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it away down to fine leg
Mendis to Bailey, no run tossed up and he comes forward and drives to cover
Mendis to Bailey, no run comes well forward and he gets an inside edge to the on side
Mendis to Bailey, no run

Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run Another appeal for a run out and Bailey is just home! Hughes softly pushed it to mid-on and there was hesitation, Hughes set off after a bit and Bailey was ball-watching, had to hurry, the throw was slow to the k
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run flatter ball and turned towards square leg
Dilshan to Hughes, no run tossed up outside off and he comes well forward and defends
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run fuller delivery and he pushes it down to long-on
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run stays back and punches it down to long-on
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run drops it short and he cuts him
Mendis to Hughes, 1 leg bye stays back and clips it off his pads
Mendis to Bailey, 3 runs tossed up and he leans forward and drives wide of cover
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run pitched up and he works it down to long-on
Mendis to Bailey, no run he comes forward and defends
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run stays back and punches it to the off side
Mendis to Hughes, no run comes round the wicket, he stays back and defends
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends

Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run another appeal for a run-out! What's happening guys? Bailey punches it towards point where Dilshan does well to dive and stop it, Bailey was ball-watching, Hughes set off, confusion, Bailey took off rathe
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run comes forward and works it wide of mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run stays back and defends this one
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run full outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
Perera to Hughes, 1 run good length on the pads and he works it down to square leg
Perera to Bailey, no run he swishes at one outside off, extra bounce for Perera
Perera to Bailey, no run fuller delivery and he works it down to mid-on
Perera to Bailey, 1 run tucks it away down to short midwicket
Perera to Hughes, 1 run full on the pads and he works him down to mid-on, the fielder is a bit deep
Perera to Bailey, FOUR runs thudded down the ground! Half volley outside the off stump, he gets forward and bashes it wide of the bowler who tries to boot it away, beats mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run full on the off stump and he comes forward and defends
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run gets forward and pushes it towards mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run stays beside the line and he punches it to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run stays beside the line and he steers it towards point
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run too straight on the pads and he drills it down to long-on
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run that was wide outside off and Hughes reaches out and cuts, twirls his bat on the follow through
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, 1 run stays back and he works it to the on side
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 1 run drops it a fraction short, stays back and works it to midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, no run slower through the air and defended softly
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, no run tossed up outside off and pushed to the off side
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, 1 run that was a googly, rocked back and pulled to square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, no run another googly but he works it off his pads and the ball drops to the on side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run stays back and works it away to the on side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run just opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run stays at the crease and punches it to the vacant cover point region and calls quickly
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs nicely timed, this was full, the slower ball in fact and he drills a half volley down the ground and beats a diving mid-off
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run full outside the off stump and he works it down to cover
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run just closes the face of the bat and works it just wide of midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, FOUR runs that was well played! Bailey moved right across his stumps and pulled him behind square on one knee, well in control, Malinga at fine leg couldn't stop it
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, no run comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 1 run comes forward and pushes it to cover
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, 1 run goes back and pulls him wide of midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 2 runs tossed up outside off and he gets forward and drills it wide of cover
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, no run fuller and flatter and Bailey plonks forward and defends
Perera to Hughes, no run stays back and he steers it to the off side, bit of extra bounce
Perera to Hughes, no run fuller and he comes forward and defends
Perera to Hughes, 1 run just short of a length and he opens the face and runs it down to third man
Perera to Bailey, 1 run turns it away down to square leg for a single
Perera to Hughes, 1 run stays beside the line and he turns it down to point
Perera to Bailey, no run good length on the off stump and he steers it to the off side
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, FOUR runs tossed up and it's a full toss which he drills wide of mid-off, puts away a boundary ball
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, no run tossed up and he stays back and defends
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, 1 run
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 2 runs tossed up outside off and he cuts him square on the off side
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, no run
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, SIX runs tossed up and Baily chips down the track and he lofts him high and crisp over long-on, didn't look to hit it too hard, top shot
Perera to Hughes, no run short of a length and he punches it to the off side
Perera to Hughes, no run stays back and steers it to the off side
Perera to Hughes, FOUR runs shot! This was short of a length on middle and leg, Hughes stays back and pulls on one leg wide of square leg, quite stylish
Perera to Hughes, no run stays back and punches it to the off side
Perera to Hughes, no run to short and wide and Perera gets away with a dot ball, thumped straight to point
Perera to Hughes, FOUR runs moves to the 80s! Half volley outside the off stump, he gets forward and drives off the meat of the bat past cover and even beats the sweeper
Malinga to Bailey, 1 run starts off with a loosener on the pads which he clips away down to fine leg
Malinga to Hughes, no run short outside off and he shapes to cut and ends up chopping it on the first bounce to the keeper
Malinga to Hughes, no run bangs it in short and he ducks under the bouncer, two are allowed for the over as per the new rules
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run full and wide outside off and he drives him down to long-off
Malinga to Bailey, 1 run bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls along the ground to fine leg
Malinga to Hughes, no run another sharp bouncer and it just fizzes past Hughes' helmet
Perera to Bailey, 1 run bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls him down to deep square leg
Perera to Hughes, 1 run stays beside the line and he steers it to the off side
Perera to Bailey, no run goes across and punches him straight to mid-off
Perera to Bailey, FOUR runs that's a slower ball and he swivels and pulls down to fine leg, finds the gap and hits it hard enough to send it through
Perera to Bailey, FOUR runs another one down to fine leg! Bad ball from Perera, down the leg side and short, turns at the crease and pulls this one finer
Perera to Bailey, no run fullish outside the off stump and he drives straight to short cover
Malinga to Hughes, no run slower ball and he pushes it towards backward point
Malinga to Hughes, no run squared him up and the leading edge nearly pops back to the bowler on the full
Malinga to Hughes, no run Malinga's exploiting the new bouncer rule well, Hughes bends down and evades it
Malinga to Hughes, no run fullish outside off and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
Malinga to Hughes, no run another bouncer, the slower one this time, sails over Hughes' arched back
Malinga to Hughes, no run fullish in length outside off and pushed down to cover and that's a maiden
Kulasekara to Bailey, 2 runs nips back in and he clips it wide of midwicket, Hughes wants two and the throw to the bowler's end was very wide and that's a fifty for the Aus captain!
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run stays back and punches him away down to mid-off
Kulasekara to Bailey, 1 run this was shorter and pulled away down to square leg
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run drifts back in and he clips it away down to deep midwicket
Kulasekara to Bailey, 1 run banged in short and he swivels and works him down to deep square leg
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run drifts on the pads and he works him down to mid-on
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 1 run bowls it flatter and he rocks back and slaps it to the sweeper on the off side
Jeevan Mendis to Hughes, 1 run slower and tossed up and he whips it behind square on the leg side
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 2 runs too wide outside off and slapped away hard to the sweeper
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, FOUR runs mid-on's up! Tossed up and he comes down the track and hammers a full toss down to long-on
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, no run fuller on the stumps and pushes it to square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Bailey, 1 run full outside the off stump and he drills it down to long-off
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run bowls it flatter and he gets down and plays the front foot pull
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run full and wide outside the off stump and he drills it to the off side
Mendis to Bailey, no run full outside off and he thuds it towards cover
Mendis to Bailey, no run
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run
Mendis to Hughes, no run comes round the wicket, Hughes tries to dab it away late and he misses it
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run tossed up on the pads and he works it away to square leg
Dilshan to Hughes, no run slower through the air, he stays back and punches it towards mid-off
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run full outside the off stump and pushed to the off side
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run drops it a bit short and he swivels and plays a short arm pull
Dilshan to Hughes, no run nearly gave it away! Tossed up and went for the slog and the ball just sneaked past the bat and the off stump
Dilshan to Hughes, 2 runs tossed up outside the off stump and he stays back and cuts him to deep point
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run drifts on the pads and he works it away to square leg
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run worked away off the pads down to midwicket and they really have to hurry the single
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run stays back and he works it down to point
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run keeps a touch low and wide outside off and he cuts him wide of point, sneaks in a single
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run this one spins back in sharply, makes room and chops it down to point
Mendis to Hughes, no run quicker one and he opens the face and dabs it down to short third man
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run punches it towards mid-off
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run slower ball and he punches it towards cover
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run short delivery and he pulls it wide of mid-on
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run yorker length delivery which he squirts out to the leg side
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run yorker length and he jams it out and he limps the single
Malinga to Haddin, no run driven back to Malinga who boots it away
Kulasekara to Hussey, 2 runs driven down to long-on and Dilshan dives and stops it
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 bye passes between his legs and they sneak in a bye
Kulasekara to Haddin, 1 run good death bowling and he eases a single to cover
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs pulls a short ball wide of square leg
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs back to back boundaries! He steers a full delivery wide of the covers for a boundary
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run backs away and clips it towards midwicket
Malinga to Bailey, 3 runs fullish outside the off stump and drilled down the ground down to long-off
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run slower ball and shorter, stays back and opens the face and dabs it down to short third man
Malinga to Bailey, 1 run fires that full outside the off stump and he gets his bat down to and jams it down to point, throw to the bowler was wide
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs he's now just three away! Lovely improvisation, Malinga fired that full and wide outside off, used the pace on that and squirted it wide of point, raced away
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run slower ball and wide down the leg side and tucked away just wide of the keeper
Malinga to Bailey, FOUR runs excellent placement! Malinga fires that full and wide, close to a yorker length, Bailey got his bat down and crunched that wide of cover and beat the sweeper in the deep
Mendis to Hughes, no run
Mendis to Hughes, 1 run moves to 99, pushes it in front of cover for a single
Mendis to Bailey, 1 run stays back and punches him down to long-on
Mendis to Hughes, no run stays back and chops it down to short third man, tries to pinch a run!

Mendis to Hughes, 1 run first Australian to score a ODI ton on debut! Bowls round the wicket, on the pads and he easily clips it wide of midwicket, saves the emotion for when he grounds his bat at the other end, well played PJ! Takes off
Mendis to Bailey, no run
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run yorker length and he digs it out to mid-on
Malinga to Haddin, no run goes for the cut and he jams it back to the bowler

Malinga to Haddin, 1 bye
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run works a yorker length and he drills it wide of midwicket
Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs he chips it over mid-off and J Mendis does well to stop it at the rope
Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs full on the stumps and he works it wide of midwicket
Mendis to Hussey, 1 wide looks to sweep this one but misses
Mendis to Hussey, FOUR runs full on the stumps and he drills it wide of midwicket
Mendis to Hussey, SIX runs down the track and launches it over long-off and Hussey brings up his fifty
Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs full on the stumps and he drives wide of midwicket
Mendis to Hussey, FOUR runs hits it straight, Jeevan Mendis runs across and tries to cut it off and parries it to long-off
6pm: Should be interesting if Dilshan fires early. Join us in 30 minutes.

So Australia end the innings at a commanding 305 for 5. Phillip Hughes managed a century on debut, the first Australian to do so. George Bailey managed 89 and it bodes well for Australia that their second string managed a massive score, without
Welcome back. The players are walking out. Starc to bowl
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run full and moves away from him and he defends
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run leaves it alone to the keeper
Starc to Upul Tharanga, 1 wide drifts down the leg side and wide called
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run gets some extra bounce and he defends to the off side
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run he gets across and defends
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run fullish delivery on the off stump and he stays behind the line to defend
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run pushes it towards cover
McKay to Dilshan, 1 wide he strays well down the leg side and wide called
McKay to Dilshan, no run pushes at it and it misses the outside edge
McKay to Dilshan, no run full and moves away and he swishes and misses
McKay to Dilshan, no run short outside off and moves away and he leaves it alone
McKay to Dilshan, no run tucks it away to the leg side and he doesn't take the single
McKay to Dilshan, no run this one moves back in and he goes for the drive and the ball passes the pad and bat
McKay to Dilshan, no run good length delivery and tucked to the on side
Starc to Upul Tharanga, 1 run full and wide outside off and he gets an outside edge on the drive and it goes to third man
Starc to Dilshan, FOUR runs this was full and wide outside off and he goes for the drive and gets an outside edge that goes past first slip
Starc to Dilshan, no run good length outside off and he defends back to the bowler
Starc to Dilshan, no run full on the off stump and driven to cover
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run pitched up and moving away and he drives wide of cover
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run taps it to the off side and he thinks of a single, direct hit and he was safe at the crease, direct hit and Jayawardene was home
McKay to Dilshan, 1 leg bye
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run stays back and defends this one
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs loose ball on the pads, it was a half volley and he whips it just wide of midwicket
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nips back in and he stays back and tries to cut but ends up chopping it away
Starc to Dilshan, no run just short of a length and he taps it towards third man
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run angles across him and he stays back and defends
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and angling across him and he comes across and drives to cover
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run skids through and hits his pads and lobs to the off side as he tries to work it to the on side
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run that was nicely driven but straight to the fielder at mid-on, shows the full face of the bat
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run short and wide outside off and he gets across and cuts towards point
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT the captain goes! Good delivery by McKay, lands on a good length outside off, Jayawardene pokes his bat out and the edge goes to Finch at first slip
McKay to Chandimal, no run this was full and moving away and he went forward and defended it
McKay to Chandimal, no run stays back and defends it to the leg side
McKay to Chandimal, no run goes back at the crease and he pushes it down to point
McKay to Chandimal, no run moves it back in to the right-hander and he defends it
Starc to Dilshan, no run fires that full outside the off stump and he pushes it back to the bowler
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run just drops short of third man! This was short and wide outside off and Dilshan slashed it, it went flat and quick and Khawaja dives and did well to at least save four runs
Starc to Chandimal, no run fuller delivery and he leaves it alone
Starc to Chandimal, FOUR runs smashed! That was a half volley outside off and he bent his knee and crashed it past cover, textbook drive
Starc to Chandimal, no run gets across and defends
Starc to Chandimal, no run slash and a miss, it was wide outside off and Chandimal couldn't resist temptation
McKay to Dilshan, FOUR runs the boundaries are flowing now! It was a half volley outside off and Dilshan went forward and thrashed that between mid-off and cover
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run nips back in and he tucks it to the on side
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run drifts towards the body and he shuffles and tucks it to the leg side
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run nips back in and he tucks it towards midwicket and sets off for a quick single
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run stays beside the line and steers it just wide of the diving point fielder
McKay to Dilshan, no run hits a good length and he stays back and defends
Johnson to Chandimal, no run on target around the off stump, he stays back and defends
Johnson to Chandimal, no run fires that full on the off stump and he jams it out to mid-off
Johnson to Chandimal, no run good rhythm here, on the off stump and he forces it on the back foot
Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run fuller in length on middle and leg and he works it away wide of midwicket
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 wide short ball down the leg side and he shoulders arms
Johnson to Dilshan, no run good length delivery just outside the off stump and he gets good carry to the keeper
Johnson to Dilshan, no run good length on the stumps and solidly defended back to the bowler
McKay to Chandimal, no run short and wide outside off and he slashes and misses, a false shot
McKay to Chandimal, no run just short of a length and he pushes it to the off side
McKay to Chandimal, no run bends his knee slightly and he drives to point
McKay to Chandimal, no run works it away down to mid-on with the angle
McKay to Chandimal, no run fires that full outside off and he biffs that away but straight to cover, too bad it wasn't in the gap
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run short of a length outside off and wide and he rocks back and cuts him wide of backward point
Johnson to Chandimal, no run short of a length and he rocks back and tucks it to the on side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run back of a length on the off stump and he clips him to the on side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run another booming cover dive finds the fielder, full and wide and deserving to be spanked, Hughes does well at short cover
Johnson to Chandimal, no run full outside off and he jams it out to the off side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run excellent fielding! Maxwell's the man this time at backward point, this was short and wide outside off and he slapped it
Johnson to Chandimal, 2 runs slower ball and he swivels and pulls him in front of square, Smith cuts it off, not sure who he's in for
Doherty to Dilshan, no run gets away with a short and wide start, Dilshan hacks straight to point.
Doherty to Dilshan, no run tosse dup at 85 kph on middle and leg, Dilshan reaches out and plays it back.
Doherty to Dilshan, 2 runs another half-tracker, Dilshan cuts into the covers and they hustle back for two. Not the best bit of timing.
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up in off, Dilshan leans out and pushes into the covers. They sprint through for a single.
Doherty to Chandimal, no run hint of spin away from off stump, Chandimal stays back and pushes to the offside.
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run flighted on leg and Chandimal drives it through to long-on for a single.
Johnson to Chandimal, no run good length, attacking the stumps, and it is blocked down the pitch.

Johnson to Chandimal, FOUR runs boy, what a gorgeous stroke! This is why so much is expected of Chandimal. It was a length ball angling across, Chandimal half-stepped towards the line and then let his hands do the job. Expansive, on the
Johnson to Chandimal, FOUR runs not so pretty this time.. It was slightly shorter, and Chandimal flashed at it wildly. The thick edge flew safely through third man for another four.
Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run Mitch corrects the line, gets it straighter and Chandimal works it to the leg side for one.
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run edged, but safe. Dilshan jabs hard at another angler outside off, and it went through where third slip would have been.
Johnson to Chandimal, no run short of a length to end the over - a good one for SL. Chandimal defends from the crease.
Doherty to Dilshan, no run on a length, defended off the front foot.
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run on the stumps, worked with the angle softly to the leg side. Haddin charged after it and flicked under arm towards the bowler's end, but Dishan was easily through.
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal pushes a single off the front foot.
Doherty to Dilshan, no run short and turning, but the ball stops on Dilshan as he shapes to cut. He mistimes it to point.
Doherty to Dilshan, no run straightening from leg, Dilshan goes down to sweep and misses out. He hits it well, but straight to short fine leg.

Doherty to Dilshan, FOUR runs finally Dilshan gets the cut away. Short, wide, asking for trouble, and Doherty eventually pays the price as Dilshan eludes point and sweeper cover. Things looking up for Sri Lanka.
Johnson to Chandimal, no run
Johnson to Chandimal, no run fires that on the stumps and he comes across and punches it to the off side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run shorter in length and he stays behind the line and defends to the off side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run not sure what he was trying to do, too close to cut, cramped for room, the ball dribbles towards the keeper
Johnson to Chandimal, no run once again looks to cut and he chops it towards point
Johnson to Chandimal, no run good length on middle and leg and he stays back and defends
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run close call for Dilshan as he sweeps and the ball lobs off the back of the bat and goes over Haddin's head, he didn't see it at all
Doherty to Chandimal, no run

Doherty to Chandimal, no run Appeal for an lbw turned down and Doherty reviews it. Tossed up and lands on leg stump and he goes for the sweep and the ball hits the back leg, Reiffell shakes his head. Ball tracker showed that clearing the
Doherty to Chandimal, no run flighted outside off and he defends
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run tossed up and full and he drives him wide of cover
Doherty to Dilshan, no run full outside off and he pushes it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Chandimal, 1 run comes round the wicket, drops it shortish outside off and he rocks back and cuts

Maxwell to Chandimal, 1 run stays back and taps it softly to the off side
Maxwell to Dilshan, no run he goes for the cut this time and he's beaten, extra bounce
Maxwell to Dilshan, no run makes room and tries to find the gap past point, another dot
Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up and he comes forward and works it to mid-on

Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up and he clips it behind square

Johnson to Dilshan, OUT Direct hit and Dilshan looks in trouble! Yes he is a mile out, it was a risky run, he pushed it towards mid-off and set off, Khawaja attacked the ball, picked up and hit the stumps direct at the bowler's end, the

Doherty to Chandimal, OUT Appeal for a run-out and Mathews is in trouble and the direct hit sends him back! Tossed up and Chandimal drops it to the off side, the striker tells Mathews to stay back, Mathews was already a few yards in fron

Doherty to Chandimal, OUT Two run outs off successive balls would you believe it! It's that man Maxwell again. Chandinal dropped it towards short cover and set off, hesitation in the running, Maxwell runs to his right, picks up and in on
Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, no run could have been a hat-trick! Dropped towards short third man, Mendis was a few yards out of his crease, Chandimal sent him back

Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, OUT soft dismissal! Length ball skids through and Mendis tries to launch it over the bowler's head, not in control and he miscues it to mid-off, easy catch to Bailey

McKay to Chandimal, OUT superb catch by Haddin! McKay pitched it up and bowled it wide of the off stump getting him to drive, thick outside edge and Haddin timed his dive to his right very well and plucked it one-handed. He nonchalantly

Johnson to Kulasekara, no run just short of a length and he stays back and defends
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run tucked him up for room and he awkwardly pushes it to cover
Johnson to Perera, no run skids through and Perera goes for the slash and he's beaten
Johnson to Perera, 1 run fires that full and wide outside off and he slashes and that's in the air down to third man
Johnson to Kulasekara, FOUR runs drifts on the pads and he puts his front pad out and heaves him over square leg, finds the gap, SL need plenty more of these
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 leg bye awkwardly fends off a short ball on the body, scampers the single
McKay to Kulasekara, no run short of a length on the body and he tucks it away down to square leg
McKay to Kulasekara, 1 wide short down the leg side and Kula goes for the hook and nearly gloves it, Haddin starts to appeal but withdraws
McKay to Kulasekara, 1 wide another short one and another attempted hook, passes the glove and Haddin goes through with the appeal, late call for a wide by Reiffel
McKay to Kulasekara, FOUR runs he continues peppering him with the short one, Kula swivels and pulls him down to fine leg, just beats fine leg
McKay to Kulasekara, 1 run tucked away behind square for a single
McKay to Perera, 2 runs full on the stumps and he heaves him down to deep midwicket

McKay to Perera, no run slower delivery and he gets a bottom edge to the keeper
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 wide that was too short and quick for Kula, he bends down and evades it

Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run makes room and he mistimes the cut to the off side

McKay to Mendis, OUT it's all over, at the stroke of the 40th over! Catching practice for Haddin, Mendis gets a length ball which he presumably wants to dab to third man, only managed a thick edge, Haddin would have caught that with his

Otherwise that's it from here. There's still the India-England ODI and the SA v NZ Test to keep you occupied. We're back for the second ODI at Adelaide in two days. Same time. Thanks for your company. Cheers!
Phillip Hughes is the Man of the Match. We don't have coverage of the presentation.
It can't be too bad a team when you have the likes of Hughes, Khawaja and Finch in probably the form of his life. He didn't perform today but his time will come.
Australia won by 107 runs
Player of the match is Phillip Hughes, AUS
